div.p: The Laboratory for Ubiquitous Computing an Interaction would like to be a resource for researchers pushing the boundaries of pervasive technologies. To that end we have established this repository of code and data.
The code repository offers on the open source model in which the code is free and users are encouraged to contribute improvements to it.
The data reposistory offers a place for researchers to put their data so that others may validate their work and possibly imporve existing techniques.
